org.kitesdk.data.crunch

Class CrunchDatasets

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kitesdk.data.crunch.CrunchDatasets

  • public class CrunchDatasets
extends Object

    A helper class for exposing Datasets and Views as Crunch ReadableSources or Targets.

      • partition

        public static <E> PCollection<E> partition(PCollection<E> collection,
                           View<E> view)
        Partitions collection to be stored efficiently in View.

        This restructures the parallel collection so that all of the entities that will be stored in a given partition will be processed by the same writer.

        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of entities in the collection and underlying dataset
        Parameters:
        collection - a collection of entities
        view - a View of a dataset to partition the collection for
        Returns:
        an equivalent collection of entities partitioned for the view
        Since:
        0.16.0

      • partition

        public static <E> PCollection<E> partition(PCollection<E> collection,
                           Dataset<E> dataset)
        Partitions collection to be stored efficiently in dataset.

        This restructures the parallel collection so that all of the entities that will be stored in a given partition will be processed by the same writer.

        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of entities in the collection and underlying dataset
        Parameters:
        collection - a collection of entities
        dataset - a dataset to partition the collection for
        Returns:
        an equivalent collection of entities partitioned for the view
        Since:
        0.16.0

      • partition

        public static <E> PCollection<E> partition(PCollection<E> collection,
                           View<E> view,
                           int numWriters)
        Partitions collection to be stored efficiently in View.

        This restructures the parallel collection so that all of the entities that will be stored in a given partition will be processed by the same writer.

        If the dataset is not partitioned, then this will structure all of the entities to produce a number of files equal to numWriters.

        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of entities in the collection and underlying dataset
        Parameters:
        collection - a collection of entities
        view - a View of a dataset to partition the collection for
        numWriters - the number of writers that should be used
        Returns:
        an equivalent collection of entities partitioned for the view
        Since:
        0.16.0
        See Also:
        partition(PCollection, View)

      • partition

        public static <E> PCollection<E> partition(PCollection<E> collection,
                           Dataset<E> dataset,
                           int numWriters)
        Partitions collection to be stored efficiently in dataset.

        This restructures the parallel collection so that all of the entities that will be stored in a given partition will be processed by the same writer.

        If the dataset is not partitioned, then this will structure all of the entities to produce a number of files equal to numWriters.

        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of entities in the collection and underlying dataset
        Parameters:
        collection - a collection of entities
        dataset - a dataset to partition the collection for
        numWriters - the number of writers that should be used
        Returns:
        an equivalent collection of entities partitioned for the view
        Since:
        0.16.0
        See Also:
        partition(PCollection, Dataset)
